typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> aymericVenteDirecte
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> aymericSAP
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ATC
aymericVenteDirecte derive(DiffusChantier = iif({Canal distribution}=="43","Chantier","Diffus"),
		Marque = iif({Org. commerciale}=="1604","SaunierDuval","Vaillant")) ~> aymericpreparederivee
aymericSAP select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> aymericSAPFiltre
aymericSAPFiltre aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal}),
	{Agence commerciale} = first({Agence commerciale})) ~> Aggregate1
ATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		ATC,
		code_postal_atc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
aymericpreparederivee sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> aymericVenteDirectePrepared
